categories.title: Scientific Databases
categories.description: Query PubMed, UniProt, ChEMBL, PDB, bioRxiv, and 20+ scientific databases

examples.title: PubMed Literature Search
examples.description: Search biomedical literature with advanced filters
examples.prompt: Search PubMed for recent papers on CRISPR-Cas9 gene editing in cancer therapy from 2024-2025. Summarize the top 5 most cited papers.

examples.title: bioRxiv Preprint Search
examples.prompt: Search bioRxiv for recent preprints on single-cell RNA sequencing in neurodegenerative diseases. Get the top 5 with their abstracts.
examples.output:
Found 127 preprints matching criteria:

1. DOI: 10.1101/2025.12.15.123456
   Title: Single-cell atlas of Alzheimer's disease progression
   Authors: Smith et al.
   Posted: 2025-12-15
   Category: Neuroscience

2. DOI: 10.1101/2025.11.28.654321
   Title: scRNA-seq reveals microglial heterogeneity in Parkinson's
   ...

examples.title: UniProt Protein Information
examples.prompt: Look up the human TP53 protein in UniProt. Get its sequence, function, and known disease associations.

examples.title: ChEMBL Drug Data
examples.description: Query bioactive compounds and drug data
examples.prompt: Search ChEMBL for compounds that inhibit EGFR with IC50 < 100nM. List their structures and bioactivity data.
examples.output:
Found 847 compounds with EGFR IC50 < 100nM:

Top results by potency:
1. CHEMBL553 (Gefitinib) - IC50: 2.1nM
   SMILES: COc1cc2ncnc(Nc3ccc(F)c(Cl)c3)c2cc1OCCCN4CCOCC4
   Mechanism: EGFR tyrosine kinase inhibitor

2. CHEMBL554 (Erlotinib) - IC50: 0.8nM
   ...

examples.title: PDB Structure Lookup
examples.prompt: Find the crystal structure of human insulin receptor (INSR) in PDB. What is the resolution and binding site information?

examples.title: ClinicalTrials.gov API Search
examples.prompt: Search ClinicalTrials.gov for Phase 3 breast cancer immunotherapy trials currently recruiting in the US. Show enrollment and endpoints.
examples.output:
Found 42 Phase 3 breast cancer immunotherapy trials:

1. NCT04191135 - Pembrolizumab + Chemotherapy
   Status: RECRUITING | Phase: 3
   Enrollment: 1,200 patients
   Primary Endpoint: Pathological complete response
   Locations: 85 sites in US

2. NCT05382286 - Atezolizumab + T-DXd
   ...

examples.title: AACT Database SQL Query
examples.prompt: Query AACT database: find all Phase 3 oncology trials sponsored by Pfizer in the last 5 years. Show their primary outcomes and completion rates.
examples.output:
Query executed on AACT (566,234 studies):

| nct_id | brief_title | phase | start_date | overall_status |
|--------|-------------|-------|------------|----------------|
| NCT04379596 | Pembrolizumab vs Chemo | Phase 3 | 2020-05 | Completed |
| NCT04191135 | Palbociclib Combo | Phase 3 | 2021-02 | Recruiting |
...

examples.title: Semantic Literature Search
examples.prompt: Use semantic search to find papers about 'machine learning approaches for drug-target interaction prediction'. Rank by relevance.

categories.title: Medical & Clinical Tools
categories.description: ICD-10 codes, NPI lookup, Medicare coverage, and clinical data

examples.title: ICD-10 Code Lookup
examples.description: Look up diagnosis and procedure codes
examples.prompt: Look up ICD-10 codes for Type 2 Diabetes with complications. Show the hierarchy from E11 and list all specific complication codes.
examples.output:
ICD-10-CM Code: E11 - Type 2 diabetes mellitus

Hierarchy:
E11.0 - Type 2 DM with hyperosmolarity
E11.1 - Type 2 DM with ketoacidosis
E11.2 - Type 2 DM with kidney complications
  E11.21 - with diabetic nephropathy
  E11.22 - with diabetic CKD
E11.3 - Type 2 DM with ophthalmic complications
  E11.31 - with diabetic retinopathy
  E11.32 - with diabetic macular edema
...

examples.title: ICD-10 Code Search
examples.prompt: Search ICD-10 for all codes related to 'acute myocardial infarction'. Show codes, descriptions, and which are billable.

examples.title: NPI Provider Lookup
examples.description: Validate and look up healthcare providers
examples.prompt: Look up NPI 1234567890. Verify it's valid and show the provider's name, specialty, practice location, and credentials.
examples.output:
NPI Validation: VALID (Luhn check passed)

Provider Details:
NPI: 1234567890
Type: Individual (NPI-1)
Name: John Smith, MD
Credential: MD, FACC
Specialty: Cardiovascular Disease
Address: 123 Medical Center Dr, Boston, MA 02115
Phone: (617) 555-0123
License: MA-12345 (Active)

examples.title: NPI Provider Search
examples.description: Find providers by name, specialty, location
examples.prompt: Search for cardiologists in Boston, MA. Show their NPIs, practice addresses, and subspecialties.

examples.title: Medicare NCD Coverage Search
examples.prompt: Search Medicare NCDs for coverage of continuous glucose monitoring (CGM) devices. What are the coverage criteria?
examples.output:
NCD 40.2 - Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM)

Coverage Status: COVERED with conditions

Criteria:
1. Patient has diabetes mellitus
2. Patient is insulin-treated
3. Patient performs 4+ finger-stick tests/day
4. Ordered by treating physician

Covered Devices:
- Dexcom G6/G7
- Abbott FreeStyle Libre 2/3
- Medtronic Guardian Connect

examples.title: Medicare LCD Search
examples.prompt: Search for LCDs covering molecular diagnostic testing for oncology in California. What MAC handles this region?

categories.title: Bioinformatics & Genomics
categories.description: Sequence analysis, genomics, and computational biology tools

examples.title: Sequence Analysis with BioPython
examples.prompt: Use BioPython to analyze this DNA sequence: ATGCGATCGATCGATCGATCG. Calculate GC content, translate to protein, and find restriction sites.

examples.title: BLAST Sequence Search
examples.prompt: Run a BLAST search for this protein sequence against the nr database: MVLSPADKTNVKAAWGKVGAHAGEYGAEALERMFLSFPTTKTYFPHFDLSH

examples.title: Single-Cell RNA-seq Analysis
examples.prompt: Load a single-cell RNA-seq dataset and perform standard preprocessing: quality control, normalization, highly variable genes, PCA, and UMAP clustering.

examples.title: AlphaFold Structure Prediction
examples.prompt: Retrieve the AlphaFold predicted structure for human BRCA1 protein. What is the confidence score and domain organization?

categories.title: Drug Discovery & Chemistry
categories.description: Cheminformatics, molecular modeling, and drug design tools

examples.title: Molecular Analysis with RDKit
examples.prompt: Use RDKit to analyze aspirin (CC(=O)OC1=CC=CC=C1C(=O)O). Calculate molecular weight, LogP, H-bond donors/acceptors, and check Lipinski's Rule of Five.

examples.title: Drug Mechanism Lookup
examples.prompt: Use ChEMBL to look up the mechanism of action for Imatinib. What targets does it inhibit and what are the binding affinities?

examples.title: ADMET Properties
examples.prompt: Get ADMET properties for Metformin from ChEMBL. Show absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, and toxicity data.

examples.title: Protein-Ligand Docking
examples.prompt: Use DiffDock to dock imatinib to the ABL kinase. Predict binding poses and confidence scores.

examples.title: DrugBank Drug Information
examples.prompt: Look up metformin in DrugBank. Get its mechanism of action, targets, drug interactions, and pharmacokinetics.

examples.title: ADMET Property Prediction
examples.description: Predict absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, toxicity
examples.prompt: Use DeepChem to predict ADMET properties for this compound: CC(C)CC1=CC=C(C=C1)C(C)C(=O)O (ibuprofen)

categories.title: Machine Learning & AI
categories.description: PyTorch, scikit-learn, transformers, and deep learning tools

examples.title: Classification with scikit-learn
examples.prompt: Create a random forest classifier for a binary classification task. Include cross-validation, feature importance, and ROC-AUC evaluation.

examples.title: PyTorch Neural Network
examples.prompt: Create a PyTorch neural network for image classification on MNIST. Include training loop, validation, and accuracy metrics.

examples.title: NLP with Transformers
examples.prompt: Use Hugging Face Transformers to perform sentiment analysis on scientific paper abstracts. Use a BERT-based model.

examples.title: Model Interpretability with SHAP
examples.prompt: Use SHAP to explain predictions from an XGBoost model. Create summary plots and individual prediction explanations.

examples.title: HuggingFace Model Search
examples.prompt: Search HuggingFace for the top protein language models. Compare their sizes, licenses, and download counts. Which one is best for embeddings?

examples.title: HuggingFace Dataset Discovery
examples.description: Find and explore datasets on HuggingFace
examples.prompt: Find datasets on HuggingFace related to clinical notes or medical text. Show their sizes, formats, and licensing information.

categories.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
categories.description: Pandas, Polars, matplotlib, plotly, and statistical analysis

examples.title: Fast Data Analysis with Polars
examples.prompt: Use Polars to load a large CSV file, perform groupby aggregations, and filter data. Show the performance advantage over pandas.

examples.title: Interactive Plots with Plotly
examples.prompt: Create an interactive scatter plot with Plotly showing gene expression data. Add hover info, color by cluster, and export as HTML.

examples.title: Statistical Visualization with Seaborn
examples.prompt: Use Seaborn to create a heatmap of correlation matrix with hierarchical clustering. Add annotations and custom color palette.

examples.title: Statistical Modeling
examples.prompt: Perform linear regression with statsmodels. Include diagnostic plots, residual analysis, and confidence intervals.

categories.title: Your Data (Upload & Analyze)
categories.description: Upload your own CSV, Excel, PDF, or image files and analyze them with Claude Code

examples.title: CSV Data Exploration
examples.description: Load and explore your uploaded CSV file
examples.prompt: Load the CSV file from data/ folder. Show me the first 10 rows, column types, basic statistics, and identify any missing values or anomalies.
examples.output:
Loaded: data/experiment_results.csv

Shape: 1,247 rows x 15 columns

Columns:
- patient_id (int64)
- age (float64) - 3 missing values
- treatment_group (object)
- response_score (float64)
...

Key Statistics:
- Mean age: 54.3 +/- 12.1
- Treatment groups: Control (412), Drug A (418), Drug B (417)

examples.title: Excel Multi-Sheet Analysis
examples.description: Analyze Excel workbooks with multiple sheets
examples.prompt: Load the Excel file from data/ and analyze all sheets. Compare data across sheets and create a summary report.

examples.title: Data Visualization from CSV
examples.description: Create charts and plots from your data
examples.prompt: Load my CSV data and create visualizations: 1) Distribution plots for numeric columns, 2) Correlation heatmap, 3) Time series plot if date column exists. Save plots to output/ folder.

examples.title: PDF Text Extraction
examples.description: Extract and analyze text from PDF documents
examples.prompt: Extract all text from the PDF in data/ folder. Summarize the key findings, extract any tables, and identify important figures or statistics mentioned.

examples.title: PDF Table Extraction
examples.description: Extract tables from PDF documents to CSV
examples.prompt: Extract all tables from the PDF document in data/ folder. Convert each table to CSV format and save to output/ folder.

examples.title: Image Analysis
examples.prompt: Analyze the image(s) in data/ folder. Describe what you see, extract any text (OCR), and identify key elements or patterns.

examples.title: Data Cleaning Pipeline
examples.prompt: Load my data file and perform data cleaning: handle missing values, remove duplicates, fix data types, standardize formats, and validate data quality. Save cleaned version to output/.

examples.title: Merge Multiple Data Files
examples.description: Combine data from multiple uploaded files
examples.prompt: Load all CSV files from data/ folder. Identify common keys and merge them into a single dataset. Handle conflicts and create a merge report.

examples.title: Statistical Analysis Report
examples.description: Run statistical tests on your data
examples.prompt: Perform comprehensive statistical analysis on my data: descriptive statistics, normality tests, t-tests or ANOVA between groups, correlation analysis, and generate a statistical report.

examples.title: Build ML Model from Data
examples.description: Train a machine learning model on your uploaded data
examples.prompt: Using my CSV data, build a predictive model: 1) Explore features, 2) Split train/test, 3) Try multiple algorithms (RF, XGBoost, LogReg), 4) Evaluate and compare, 5) Save best model.

examples.title: Generate Analysis Report
examples.description: Create a comprehensive report from your data
examples.prompt: Analyze my data and generate a comprehensive markdown report with: executive summary, methodology, key findings, visualizations, and recommendations. Save to output/report.md

examples.title: Import Data to SQLite
examples.description: Load data into SQLite for SQL queries
examples.prompt: Load my CSV data into a SQLite database. Then run SQL queries to answer: 1) Top 10 records by value, 2) Group statistics, 3) Filtered subsets. Show the SQL used.

categories.title: MCP Server Tools
categories.description: Memory, Playwright, SQLite, Git, Context7, and 15+ other MCP servers

examples.title: Knowledge Graph Memory
examples.description: Store and retrieve information in memory
examples.prompt: Create a knowledge graph entity for the drug 'Remdesivir' with its properties, mechanism, and clinical uses. Then search for it.
examples.output:
Entity created:
{
  "name": "Remdesivir",
  "entityType": "Drug",
  "observations": [
    "Antiviral medication developed by Gilead Sciences",
    "FDA approved for COVID-19 treatment in October 2020",
    "Mechanism: RNA polymerase inhibitor"
  ]
}

Search results: Found 1 matching entity with 6 observations.

examples.title: Web Automation with Playwright
examples.prompt: Use Playwright to navigate to a scientific journal website, take a screenshot, and extract paper titles from the page.

examples.title: SQLite Database Queries
examples.prompt: Create a SQLite table for experiment results, insert sample data, and run analytical queries with aggregations.

examples.title: Git Repository Management
examples.prompt: Show the git status, recent commits, and create a diff of unstaged changes in the current repository.

examples.title: Context7 Documentation Lookup
examples.prompt: Use Context7 to look up the latest documentation for FastAPI authentication. Show code examples for JWT setup.

examples.title: Sequential Thinking
examples.prompt: Use sequential thinking to design a complete drug discovery pipeline: from target identification through lead optimization.

examples.title: Fetch Web Content
examples.prompt: Fetch the FDA drug approval page and extract information about recent approvals in oncology.

categories.title: Plugins & Skills
categories.description: Frontend design, feature development, code simplification, and more

examples.title: Frontend Design
examples.prompt: /frontend-design Create a modern dashboard for displaying clinical trial data with cards, charts, and a responsive layout.

examples.title: Feature Development
examples.prompt: /feature-dev Add a new API endpoint for uploading and parsing CSV files with validation and error handling.

examples.title: Code Simplification
examples.prompt: Simplify and refactor this complex function to improve readability and maintainability while preserving functionality.

examples.title: Ralph Loop Iteration
examples.prompt: /ralph-loop Start an iterative development session to build and refine a data processing pipeline.

examples.title: HuggingFace Integration
examples.prompt: Search HuggingFace for the best model for biomedical named entity recognition. Download and run inference.

categories.title: Development Tools
categories.description: Code generation, testing, documentation, and DevOps

examples.title: Python Script Generation
examples.prompt: Write a Python script that downloads protein structures from PDB, calculates RMSD between structures, and generates a report.

examples.title: REST API Design
examples.prompt: Design a FastAPI REST API for a molecular database with endpoints for CRUD operations, search, and batch processing.

examples.title: Test Generation
examples.prompt: Generate comprehensive pytest tests for a data processing module. Include fixtures, parametrized tests, and edge cases.

examples.title: Documentation Generation
examples.prompt: Generate comprehensive documentation for this Python module including docstrings, usage examples, and API reference.

categories.title: Finance & Markets
categories.description: Stock quotes, crypto prices, market data, and financial analysis

examples.title: Stock Analysis with Yahoo Finance
examples.description: Get stock quotes, historical data, and company info
examples.prompt: Get stock data for AAPL, GOOGL, and MSFT from Yahoo Finance. Compare their P/E ratios, year-to-date performance, and create a comparison chart.

examples.title: Cryptocurrency Market Data
examples.description: Get real-time crypto prices and market data
examples.prompt: Use CoinGecko to get the current prices of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana. Show their 24h change, market cap, and trading volume.

examples.title: Portfolio Analysis
examples.prompt: I have positions in AAPL (100 shares), BTC (0.5), and ETH (5). Get current prices and calculate my total portfolio value and daily P&L.

examples.title: Financial News Analysis
examples.prompt: Get the latest news for Tesla (TSLA) from Yahoo Finance. Summarize the key headlines and their potential market impact.

examples.title: Trending Cryptocurrencies
examples.prompt: What are the top trending cryptocurrencies on CoinGecko right now? Show their prices, 24h change, and market cap.

examples.title: AI Explainer Video
examples.prompt: Create a 60-second explainer video about how machine learning works. Research the topic, write a script with 5-7 scenes, and render using Remotion.

examples.title: Product Demo Video
examples.prompt: Create a product demo video showcasing a new mobile app. Include: intro hook, 3 key features with animations, and call-to-action. 45-60 seconds.

examples.title: Animated Data Visualization
examples.prompt: Create an animated video showing stock market trends over 2025. Use bar chart races and line chart animations. Include voiceover narration.

examples.title: Social Media Short
examples.prompt: Create a 30-second TikTok/Reels style video about '5 Python tips developers don't know'. Fast-paced, text overlays, engaging transitions.

categories.title: Document Generation
categories.description: Create DOCX, PDF, XLSX, and PPTX documents

examples.title: Professional DOCX Report
examples.prompt: Create a professional report in DOCX format summarizing my data analysis. Include: title page, executive summary, methodology, findings with charts, and recommendations.

examples.title: Excel Dashboard
examples.description: Create Excel workbook with formulas and charts
examples.prompt: Create an Excel dashboard for sales tracking. Include: data entry sheet, pivot tables, charts, conditional formatting, and summary formulas.

examples.title: PDF Document with Tables
examples.prompt: Create a PDF invoice template with company header, itemized table, tax calculations, and payment terms. Make it professional and printable.

examples.title: CSV to Formatted Excel
examples.prompt: Load my CSV data and create a formatted Excel workbook with: styled headers, number formatting, charts for key metrics, and a summary sheet.

examples.title: Batch Document Generation
examples.prompt: Using the customer data CSV, generate personalized DOCX letters for each customer. Include their name, account details, and custom message.

categories.title: Web Automation
categories.description: Browser automation, scraping, and web research

examples.title: Web Page Scraping
examples.prompt: Use Playwright to navigate to Hacker News, extract the top 30 post titles, scores, and links. Save to a CSV file.

examples.title: Automated Screenshots
examples.prompt: Use Playwright to take screenshots of my website at different viewport sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop). Save to output/ folder.

examples.title: Automated Form Submission
examples.prompt: Use Playwright to navigate to a contact form, fill in test data, and submit. Verify the success message appears.

examples.title: Multi-Site Research
examples.prompt: Research the top 5 JavaScript frameworks in 2026. Visit their official sites, extract key features, and create a comparison table.
